Class Calendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Calendar

  • public class Calendar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a calendar to display and/or to be printed

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[][] calendar 
      private java.lang.String[] dayOfTheWeek 
      private java.lang.String[] meal 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Calendar()
      The following constructor creates a 2D string Array with days of the week as columns and meals as rows.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[][] addADishToCalendar(java.lang.String mealName, java.lang.String dayOfTheWeek)
      The following method modifies the calendar instance variable based on the day and meal selected and adds the dish name instead of "meal" string
      java.lang.String[][] removeADishFromTheCalendar(java.lang.String mealName, java.lang.String dayOfTheWeek)
      The following method removes a meal from the calendar and places the word "meal" as a placeholder
      java.lang.String[][] replaceAMealWithAnother(java.lang.String mealNameToBeReplaced, java.lang.String dayOfTheWeekToBeReplaced, java.lang.String mealNameReplacedWith, java.lang.String dayOfTheWeekReplacedWith)
      The following method replaces a meal on the calendar with another meal from the calendar

    • Constructor Detail

      • Calendar

        public Calendar()
        The following constructor creates a 2D string Array with days of the week as columns and meals as rows. For example, Meal Name Mon Tues Wed Thur Fri Sat Sun Breakfast Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Lunch Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Snack Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Dinner Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal Meal

    • Method Detail

      • addADishToCalendar

        public java.lang.String[][] addADishToCalendar(java.lang.String mealName,
                                               java.lang.String dayOfTheWeek)
        The following method modifies the calendar instance variable based on the day and meal selected and adds the dish name instead of "meal" string
        Parameters:
        mealName - i.e. lunch, dinner, snack, etc.
        dayOfTheWeek - i.e. Sunday
        Returns:
        updated calendar

      • removeADishFromTheCalendar

        public java.lang.String[][] removeADishFromTheCalendar(java.lang.String mealName,
                                                       java.lang.String dayOfTheWeek)
        The following method removes a meal from the calendar and places the word "meal" as a placeholder
        Parameters:
        mealName - i.e. lunch, dinner, snack, etc.
        dayOfTheWeek - i.e. Sunday
        Returns:
        updated calendar

      • replaceAMealWithAnother

        public java.lang.String[][] replaceAMealWithAnother(java.lang.String mealNameToBeReplaced,
                                                    java.lang.String dayOfTheWeekToBeReplaced,
                                                    java.lang.String mealNameReplacedWith,
                                                    java.lang.String dayOfTheWeekReplacedWith)
        The following method replaces a meal on the calendar with another meal from the calendar
        Parameters:
        mealNameToBeReplaced - meal to be replaced
        dayOfTheWeekToBeReplaced - day of the week to be changed from
        mealNameReplacedWith - meal to be replaced with
        dayOfTheWeekReplacedWith - day of the week to be changed to
        Returns:
        updated calendar
